description: This file defines the DriverService class which provides operations related to drivers in a taxi booking backend, including creating drivers, retrieving driver details, listing all drivers or only available drivers, and updating driver availability status.

classes.name: DriverService
classes.description: Service class managing driver-related operations in the backend.

methods.name: createDriver
methods.description: Creates and saves a new driver along with associated vehicle details based on the request DTO.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a driver by their ID, throwing NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: listAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all drivers in the system.

methods.name: listAvailable
methods.description: Returns a list of drivers who are currently available.

methods.name: updateAvailability
methods.description: Updates the availability status of a specific driver based on ID.
